# UIProgressView.Style

**Enumeration**

The styles permitted for the progress bar.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

You can set and retrieve the current style of progress view through the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/progressViewStyle] property.

## Constants

- **UIProgressView.Style.default**: The standard progress-view style.
- **UIProgressView.Style.bar**: The style of progress view that is used in a toolbar.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
